question: You are taking a course at a local college. The deadline for your project was last week but you haven't finished it.Write a letter to your lecturer. In your letterintroduce yourselfexplain why you haven't handed in the project yetrequest more time to do it.
text: Hope my letter finds you well.
I am writing this letter to express my apology that I missed the deadline last week. I am Jimin Ampatin, one of your students in biology class.

Please be informed that I was unable to finish my project due to personal reasons. There is an emergency in our home last week that I need to resolve right away. My mother was rushed to the hospital because of successive bleeding and I need to be there for her. I hope you would understand my situation. This is a family matter that I do not want to ignore.
This, due to the above-mentioned, I appreciated it if you could give me more time to do it. Please do let me know what I need to do so that you will grant my request.
Should you have any concerns regarding my letter, please do not hesitate to contact me on my mobile number.
